body.name: Westinghouse 1701 HEPA Air Purifier with Patented Medical Grade NCCO Technology for Home, Eliminates & Kills Bacteria and Viruses, Filters Dust, Pet Dander, Odor, Allergies, Kitchen, Bedroom
features: BETTER THAN HEPA – Pre-filter, True H13 HEPA filter combined with patented NCCO technology (Nano Confined Catalytic Oxidation) sanitizes your house and kills and removes harmful pollutants. It breaks down the harmful particles in the air into harmless compounds and is more effective than a charcoal filter.

KILLS VIRUSES & BACTERIA – 4 stage, 300 square foot Westinghouse air purifiers sanitize 99.95% of virus and bacteria organisms in the home, bedroom, work place, and office. 300 square foot coverage good for medium to large rooms.
PET HAIR & ALLERGENS – Removes dog and cat hair and dander allergens from the air. Captures dust, pollen, dandruff, and other causes of seasonal allergies.
SMOKE & ODORS – Collects and degrades foul smelling molecules from secondhand cigarette smoke, cigar & pipe smoking, wildfire smoke, ash, and garbage.

TOXIC CHEMICALS – Captures and renders inert workplace VOC’s (Volatile Organic Compounds) from aerosols, acetones, paints, stains, strippers, fuels, and solvents. Our NCCO products have been awarded both CARB and cETL, having passed UL867 ozone standard testing and regulation of ozone emission products. All ozone or Active Oxygen generated by these products product is consumed inside the device

Can I purchase using FSA/HSA Card? Yes, this Air Purifier can be purchased using FSA/HSA Card. Does this air purifier have an Eco Mode? Yes, this air purifier has a quiet and energy saving eco mode. Is this item safe to use around pets? Yes, this item is safe to use around pets, and can help remove pet hair and odor from the air for easier breathing. How long does the air purifier take to sanitize the room? It is estimated that it can sanitize the air in around 15 minutes. Does this item come with a filter? Where can I buy a replacement filter? Yes, the item comes with a filter. You can purchase replacement filters through Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressions after 1 year
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this purifier because it is HSA/FSA eligible and I was intrigued by the NCCO technology which I have not seen offered on more popular purifier brands. I got this because we have cats and dogs, and live in a rural area with lots of pollen producing oak trees that leave a yellow pollen layer on everything in the springtime. I end up getting sinus infections and spend oa week or two terribly sick. The basement in my house has a damp moldy smell because the air is stagnant. I plugged this in my 12’ x 20’ basement bedroom. In an hour or so there was a very noticeable difference. When I wake up in the morning, I am no longer congested. I have used another air purifier and noticed improvement, but not as much as with this one. The air smells clean. I think the ncco and hepa combination is very effective at removing pet and damp odors from the air. I ran into the problem that other reviewers have mentioned when the display malfunctions and the EE notification and NCCO light turns red. I emailed support and they said to do this:Air Purifier Fixunplug the unit for 30 seconds or longerplug it back in1. Power the machine off.2. Then hold the power button down until you hear the click. Once you hear the click release the power button and press the fan speed up button. Speed will go up from 3 to 4 and code will appear on the display and unit will shut off.3. Repeat step 2 but when you hear the click , release the power button and press the fan speed down button. Speed will go down one level and a code will appear and the unit will shut off.4. Just power the machine on and the light will be blue.5. If the letters on the display seem off, have the customer unplug the machine and re-plug it. This is to be done after the machine has been reset if necessary.That worked for me and I haven’t had any problems since. I have also tried this upstairs in the living room and it works great. I cranked it up to 10 since there is a lot of open space square footage. After a few hours the air quality is noticeably improved. My nose is less runny and animal odors are gone. This purifier is a bit noisy running on high, but it is a nice white noise so it doesn’t bother me. The video is of the sound running on level 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, Small and Powerful
reviews.reviewText: Love, love, love !! Manages all 1400 square feet of my house. Air feels lighter, 90% less dust and i feel it has helped with health

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performance is better than I ever hoped it would be.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using one since July 14 and am impressed with its performance.I am on the road in a truck camper and , being asthmatic, havebeen concerned aabout air quality. Initially, my concerns were regarding dust and pollen. Recently heavy smoke from wildfires affecting NE Washimgton have resulted in dangerous air quality for me.I am astounded at how good the air is in the camper compared to the smoke, ash, and dust filled air outside. I can occasionally smell a hint of smoke in here after I open the door but the purifier takes it out faster than I could have hoped.I even placed it on the bed, aimed at my face, while I sleep. I no longer wake up in the morning feeling like I've smoked a pack of cigarettes in a smoky bar.Thank you for.this product. You have saved me from the emergency room, and have made my living conditions exponentially better.I just ordered a second unit in case this one fails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well Priced Passive and Active Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: The future of air purification is a mix of both active (emission and use of NCCO, PCO) and passive (HEPA filtration). Westinghouse offers a great option here with NCCO which requires little maintenance and does the trick well to purify your air while actively attaching smells, bacteria, viruses, and more. The design of the unit itself is a bit bland and needs improvement but has a daily small footprint and is easy to use.I intend to either wait for Westinghouse to release new models of these air purifiers or will purchase another within a few months as it's a better investment all-around than passive air purifiers.

reviews.reviewerName: I received it and it didn’t work . Still in box new. Just didn’t work
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely HATE IT
reviews.reviewText: Never have I got to use it because it came to me not damaged but from delivery but faulty. And when I came around to opening it up and finding out it doesn’t even turn on, it was already too late to return it. Absolute waist of my money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives the room a nice fresh scent
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well made device. Setup was easy. Internet connectivity was easy. I would argue that is does not really keep up with a 700 Sq/Ft room on it's standard setting. Put it in our 250 square foot bedroom and it does a great job on level 4.We put a bigger unit in the kitchen/living room area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Westinghouse air purifier is excellent.
reviews.reviewText: I have had no complaints. It is quiet and efficient.I am considering on buying another for another part of our house.We are using it in our family room where we spend most of our time. Would buy again since it is a medical quality machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well feels like I'm dreaming
reviews.reviewText: Let's just say this clears the air in my room really well. I have an alarm system which was previously (often) notifying me that the air quality in my room was subpar. I thought this was a fluke. I bought this air purifier, and it's working great. How do I know? Well the number one difference I've noticed is that I'm now dreaming every single night. It had been years since I'd had any sort of dreams. The sound of the purifier reminds me of a white noise machine, which I like. I'm happy I made this purchase!
